episodes.name: Good News About Hell
episodes.overview: Mark is promoted to lead a team who've had their memories surgically divided between their work and personal lives.

episodes.name: Half Loop
episodes.overview: The team train new hire Helly on macrodata refinement. Mark takes a day off to meet with a mysterious former colleague.

episodes.name: In Perpetuity
episodes.overview: Mark takes the team on a field trip, but Helly continues to rebel. A deteriorating Petey struggles to tell Mark about Lumon’s misdeeds.

episodes.name: The You You Are
episodes.overview: Irving finds an intriguing book at work. Helly aggressively pursues a meeting with her Outie. Mark attends a funeral with Ms. Selvig.

episodes.name: The Grim Barbarity of Optics and Design
episodes.overview: Irving and Dylan confront Burt about his lies. Mark and Helly discover a strange new department.

episodes.name: Hide and Seek
episodes.overview: The team angers Cobel by forming an alliance.

episodes.name: Defiant Jazz
episodes.overview: Mark and the team encounter new security measures from Cobel.

episodes.name: What's for Dinner?
episodes.overview: The team prepares a plan. Mark attends Devon and Ricken’s party.

name: Season 1
overview: At Lumon Industries, employees undergo "severance," a procedure dividing their work and personal memories. Mark, a grieving team leader, begins to uncover the dark secrets of the company, forcing him and his coworkers to confront questions of identity, free will, and corporate control.
